column1: #Text=Aunt Wu predicted I 'd have a safe journey .
#Text=" Calm man says : " No , Aunt Wu .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wow , it must be .
#Text=That explains why you were so calm !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But the fortuneteller was wrong !
#Text=You did n't have a safe journey ; you were almost killed !
#Text=" Calm man says : " But I was n't !
#Text=Oh , and Aunt Wu said if I met any travelers to give them this .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe we should go see Aunt Wu and learn our fortunes .
#Text=" Aang says : " What do you know ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , it does n't !
#Text=You ca n't really tell the future !
#Text=" Katara says : " I guess you 're not really getting wet then .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course she predicted it was going to rain .
#Text=" Katara says : " Just admit you might be wrong , and you can come under the umbrella .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , I 'm going to predict the future now .
#Text=" Aang says : " Not everyone has the gift , Sokka .
